name: BlogBuzzTime for WP
author: BlogBuzzTime

sections.description:
BlogBuzzTime displays a widget in your sidebar with current readers on your blog.

This is REAL TIME: each time an user leave, or user comes on an article, all your readers will see updated counter.

This plugin provides 2 widgets:

  • 1 showing how many users are online on your blog

  • 1 showing current readers

BlogBuzzTime vous permet d’afficher les articles en cours de lecture sur votre blog, en temps réel, ainsi que le nombre total d’internautes en ligne.
sections.installation:
Install this plugin as many others.

  1. Upload all the zip files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add the widget using the widget menu.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First stable version
  • 2013-12-24 : Add translations (EN / FR) – po files

1.0.1

  • Adding blogbuzztime plateform health in admin panel

1.0.2

  • Fix: now, show readers when reader not in singleview

1.0.3

  • Load script faster / basic optimisations
  • forbidden urls are on your blog side, not on blogbuzztime server (based on $_SERVER[‘REQUEST_URI’])

1.0.4

  • New widget: total count of online users
  • Minor translation fix

1.0.5

  • Add floating box (to use blogbuzztime without widgets supports, if needed)

1.0.6

  • New widget: current readings with pictures (based on og:picture meta tag)

1.1

  • New widget: links exchanges
  • New feature: links exchanges with other similar websites
